DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of sitagliptin and MK0431A in comparison to a commonly used medication in patients with type 2 diabetes.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Sitagliptin and MK0431A in Comparison to a Commonly Used Medication in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes (0431-068)(COMPLETED)
DOC.criteria: Patients between the ages of 18 and 78 with type 2 diabetes mellitus Patient has not been on any antihyperglycemic agent (Insulin or oral) in the last 3 months Patient has a history of type 1 diabetes mellitus or a history of ketoacidosis Patient has previously been treated with sitagliptin or has previously been in a study using a DPP4 inhibitor
